item.title: books
item.description: ##How to rerun the laravel project cloned from github ? ####Description: Laravel, composer and php mainly used in the project. After check it runs smoothly in the computer, push to github. Then Cloned it onto computer, but it cannot run. ####key word: The hint is ’no vendor’ directory. why? ####Reason: When we upload projects to github, .env will be ignored as there are a lot of messages about how to connect to your database.
